I am looking for a postdoc in applied statistics. My research interests are at the intersection of theoretical statistics, machine learning and single-cell data analysis.

From November 2019 to January 2024, I was a PhD student at Laboratoire de Mathématiques Jean Leray (Ecole Centrale de Nantes and Nantes Université - Nantes, France). I was under the supervision of Bertrand Michel and Franck Picard.
